article_title: Dallas city council members and experts at free screening of fracking film Gasland II
article_text:
Gasland II this Friday at 7 p.m. at the Texas Theater. Tickets can be reserved through Filmmaker Josh Fox will present a free screening of his latest film on the dangers of fracking,this Friday at 7 p.m. at the Texas TheaterTickets can be reserved through http://www.eventbrite.com/event/8173829143

Dallas City Councilman Scott Griggs will welcome Josh Fox, City Councilman Philip Kingston will speak, and City Councilwoman Monica Alonzo will also be in attendance.
